attributes.action: Help private day nurseries to be sustainable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the government is to achieve its childcare sufficiency targets, encourage parents to work, reduce child poverty and give children an excellent start in the early years it needs to increase support for private providers (especially new start ups)on whom it is reliant to deliver sufficient high quality early years provision in the following ways:
Scrap business rates 
Provide low interest rates on loans
Introduce tax savings
Link providers to low cost purchasing of food and essential service supplies (eg energy, food, insurance)
Make the free entitlement for 3/4 year olds more flexible for providers
